page.title: 07LOCAL HISTORY
page.content: LOCAL HISTORY Most people did their own baking of bread until freezers came in about 12 years ago.Farmers had their own animals killed for the freezer.Up to about 5 years ago the farmers' wives made food for all the farm workers. At Christmas,years ago,most families would invite all the local families to parties. Silent films were shown in Overton Hall 50 years ago,with someone playing the piano.A visit to the theatre in Chester was a great treat.Not many people had a holiday then but there were bus trips and an annual trip to Rhyl.There used to be a dance in Overton four times a year costing half a crown.There was also the Wrexham and Ellesmere Farmers Ball.Money raised would go to the church or school funds.
